book_name_ar: كتاب الفقه المنسوب لزيد بن علي
book_name_en: Fiqh Book attributed to Zaid ibn Ali
english_translation: Narrated from Ali that the Messenger of Allah ﷺ prohibited leasing land in return for a third or a quarter, and the Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: If any of you has land, then let him cultivate it or let him give it to his brother. When much land became uncultivated, they asked the Messenger of Allah ﷺ to permit them in this, so he permitted them and gave Khaybar to its people on condition that they tend its date-palms, water them, pollinate them and preserve them for half of the produce. When it ripened and the time for harvesting came, he sent Abdullah ibn Rawahah ﷺ to estimate it for them and give them their share from the half.
